item.title: Program Crash Caused by CPU Instruction
item.description: It’s inevitable to dealing with bugs in coding career. The main part of coding are implementing new features, fixing bugs and improving performance. For me, there are two kinds of bugs that is difficult to tackle: those are hard to reproduce, and those occur in code not wrote by you. Recently, I met a bug which has both features mentioned before. I write a Spark program to analyse the log and cluster them.

item.title: Import custom package or module in PySpark
item.description: First zip all of the dependencies into zip file like this. Then you can use one of the following methods to import it. |-- kk.zip | |-- kk.py Using –py-files in spark-submit When submit spark job, add --py-files=kk.zip parameter. kk.zip will be distributed with the main scrip file, and kk.zip will be inserted at the beginning of PATH environment variable. Then you can use import kk in your main script file.
